metadata.name: Regedit as Trusted Installer
metadata.comment: Detects a regedit started with TrustedInstaller privileges or by ProcessHacker.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\regedit.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\trustedinstaller.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\processhacker.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects a regedit started with TrustedInstaller privileges or by ProcessHacker.exe
